Package com.isoterik.mgdx.input

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGestureListener
    Register an instance of this interface and a GestureTrigger with InputManager to define what happens when a gesture event occurs.
    IKeyListener
    Register an instance of this interface and a KeyTrigger with InputManager to define what happens when a key event occurs.
    InputListener
    The base listener for all input listeners.
    ITouchListener
    Register an instance of this interface and a TouchTrigger with InputManager to define what happens when a touch event occurs.
    ITrigger
    The base interface for all triggers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GestureEventData
    Contains information about a GestureEventData.GestureEvent.
    GestureEventData.DataPool
    A pool for recycling instances of GestureEventData
    GestureTrigger
    A trigger for gesture events.
    InputManager
    An instance of this class is used to manage all input-related tasks of a Scene.
    KeyCodes
    Provides the key codes of all keys supported by libGDX.
    KeyEventData
    Contains information about a KeyEventData.KeyEvent.
    KeyEventData.DataPool
    A pool for recycling instances of KeyEventData
    KeyTrigger
    A trigger for key events.
    TouchEventData
    Contains information about a TouchEventData.
    TouchEventData.DataPool
    A pool for recycling instances of TouchEventData
    TouchTrigger
    A trigger for touch events.
    Trigger
    The base class for all triggers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GestureEventData.GestureEvent
    Types of gesture events
    KeyEventData.KeyEvent
    Types of key events
    TouchEventData.TouchEvent
    Types of touch events
